name: OpenSpecimen v3.3 Release
description: V3.3 release further improves the flexibility of OpenSpecimen with options to configure screens per study, enhanced bulk operations, monthly reports and new user roles.

install.tooltip: Institute name in OpenSpecimen for the first user.
Username for the database, leave empty for default (default:openspecimen)
Password for the database, leave empty for random password.
Username for the Tomcat Manager Console, leave empty for default (default:admin)
Password for the Tomcat Manager Console, leave empty for random password.
